amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress commending the government and nation of Ukraine for their decision to relinquish nuclear weapons.
amendment.purpose: An amendment expressing the sense of Congress with that the government of the Ukraine should be commended for their decision to relinquish the nuclear weakpons in its possession after the demise of the Soviet Union, for declining to participate in construction of nuclear reactors in Iran, and taking a positive and cooperative position with regard to the admission into NATO

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fox amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Mr. Serrano demanded a separate vote on the Fox amendment (A022).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fox amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 415 - 12 (Roll no. 192).
